spawn_state.description: Which state the vehicle should spawn into, see vehicle_state_machine.h for states.

on_migrated_state.description: Which state the vehicle should start in when it has migrated.

look_at_variable.description: [string]This is the look at variable to turn towards.

rotation_audio_source.description: [string]The position from where rotation audio is played

rotation_audio_started.description: [string]The audio event to send when rotation starts

rotation_audio_stopped.description: [string]The audio event to send when rotation stops

stagger_damage.description: How much damage is needed before you stagger.
